entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 10:43 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:43 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:43 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
